skills.name: Flame Block
skills.description: [SP: 30][CD: 30s] For the next 15s, slows character Move Speed by 60%. Character takes 25% less Physical DMG and 25% less Elemental DMG, and deals 600 Fire DMG every second to nearby enemies.

skills.name: Bramblethorn
skills.description: When attacked, there's a 50% chance of dealing physical damage equal to 120% of ATK to nearby enemies. Can be triggered once every 0.25s.[Ranger] Character takes 20% less Ice DMG. If other teammates are equipped with [Ranger] series weapons, character attacks deal 12% more Physical DMG.
